original_text: My Christian friends, this is what you should do when you meet together. Some of you may have a song to praise God. Some of you may have a lesson to teach about God. Other people may have a special thing that God has shown to them. Some people may have a message in a special language. Other people may explain what the message means. Do all these things to help the church become stronger. My Christian friends, this is what you should do when you meet together. Some of you may have a song to praise God. Some of you may have a lesson to teach about God. Other people may have a special thing that God has shown to them. Some people may have a message in a special language. Other people may explain what the message means. Do all these things to help the church become stronger.
korean_text: 그런즉 형제들아 어찌할까 너희가 모일 때에 각각 찬송시도 있으며 가르치는 말씀도 있으며 계시도 있으며 방언도 있으며 통역함도 있나니 모든 것을 덕을 세우기 위하여 하라

sentences.original_text: this is what you should do
Some of you may have a song
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 어떤 사람은 노래를 가질 수 있다

sentences.original_text: Some of you may have a lesson
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 어떤 사람은 가르침을 가질 수 있다

sentences.original_text: Other people may have a special thing
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들은 특별한 것을 가질 수 있다

sentences.original_text: that God has shown to them.
Some people may have a message
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 메시지를 가질 수 있다

sentences.original_text: to help the church become stronger.
